Description:
PN 1 - 312073059 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that you have failed to ensure that risk from electrical ignition sources are either eliminated or reduced so far as reasonably practicable, namely your Zuwa EM71a - 2 electrical pump.

IN - 312073114 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that you have failed to make a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks to your employees from dangers arising from dangerous substances, specifically highly flammable liquids (ethanol containing liquids), nor any explosive atmosphere that may also be created by these substances.
